Beautiful sun set, morning birds chirping, warm breezes to very cold windy days especially from November onwards to February....no need aircon. DONT WORRY....NO TOXIC AIR because meteorological station monitoring very frequently the quality of air . Punggol Northshore Drive is lovely cosy and nice place. You are rewarded with a beautiful sunrise üåÖ in the morning and a seaview of the Strait of Johore and Pulau Ubin.
One of the best place to relax, morning rising sun and moon sighting is beautiful, sea breezes blows on you gently massages your skin.
Brand new on plaza 1 . Hope its will not be the same for plaza 2. Very limited F&B . So don't get disappointed.  Visit tge Decathlon its impressive.  Looking forward to A&W to start

A great shoreline where fishermans enjoyed their day at the unobstructed strait facing Pasir Gudang. Hope that the calm remains even after all the Northshore Residences populated. While the flats are still under construction, the road may be barried therefore bikers shall not assume that the road is unobstructed all the way to Punggol Beach.
